assessment.assessmentIllegalSubmission: Warning: You are viewing an illegal submission.
assessment.feedbackHint: This feedback is associated with an assessment instruction. You can provide additional feedback for this submission element. The student will see the combined feedback during the review.
assessment.additionalFeedbackCommentPlaceholder: You can enter additional feedback here...
assessment.subsequentFeedback: This is subsequent feedback which is not included in the total score.

error.assessmentDueDateOver: The assessment due date of this exercise has passed.

assessment.assessmentLockedCurrentUser: You have the lock for this assessment
assessment.assessmentReadOnlyUnhandledComplaint: There is a complaint for this assessment. Another tutor must respond.
assessment.moreFeedbackRequest: You must respond to the feedback request.
assessment.teamComplaint: You must respond to the complaint.
assessment.automaticAssessmentComplaint: You may respond to the complaint.
assessment.automaticAssessmentFeedbackRequest: You may respond to the feedback request.
assessment.assessmentReadOnlyHandledComplaint: The complaint about your assessment has been resolved.
assessment.assessmentDueDateIsOver: Assessment Due Date has passed, the assessment will be published immediately after submitting.

diffView.highlightAssessmentDiffTooltipOn: Highlight the correction round in which the feedback was created or modified

assessment.useAsExampleSubmissionVerificationQuesti: Are you sure to import this submission as an example submission?

messages.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the assessment? Your current assessment progress will be deleted and the submission will be available for assessment to other tutors again.
messages.removeAssessmentInstructionLink: Do you want to remove the link to the assessment instruction?

dashboard.warning: Warning: The submission period is not over yet and students are still allowed to submit their solutions. Please do not start with the assessment yet!
dashboard.warningIndividual: Warning: The general submission period is over but some students with individual due dates are still allowed to submit their solutions. Please check if that is the case for the participation you want to assess.
dashboard.emptySearch: Please enter a student name to find submissions.
dashboard.bonusPointExplanation: In this exercise there are {{maxPoints}} points and {{maxBonusPoints}} bonus points, so students can achieve a maximum of {{maxPointsWithBonus}} points, which would correspond to a score of {{maxPercentage}}%.
dashboard.semiAutomaticallyAssessedSubmissions: Showing only submissions assessed with automatic assistance
